code: foo <- function(x){   # no points   a1 <- repayment(house_value * (1 - down_payment_percent),                                    beta = mortgage_rate / 12,                          m = mortage_year * 12)       ans1 <- a1 * (1 - 1/(1 + saving_rate/12)^(mortage_year * 12)) / (1 - 1/(1 + saving_rate/12))      # points   a2_a <- house_value * (1 - down_payment_percent) * 0.01 * x   a2_b <- repayment(house_value * (1 - down_payment_percent),                                    beta = (mortgage_rate - 0.25/100 * x) / 12,                          m = mortage_year * 12)    a2_b <- a2_b * (1 - 1/(1 + saving_rate/12)^(mortage_year * 12)) / (1 - 1/(1 + saving_rate/12))    ans2 <- a2_a + a2_b      return(ans1 - ans2) } point_pool <- 0:20 tbl <- tibble(point = point_pool,                `point makes better` = lapply(point_pool, foo) %>% unlist())  ggplot() +   geom_line(aes(x = point, y = `point makes better`), data = tbl) +   geom_hline(aes(yintercept = 0, color = "red")) y <- uniroot(foo, interval = c(-10, 30))  y$root ## [1] -5.456081e-05 y$f.root ## [1] -0.2130971
